column6: A miracle.... or so I thought -read the ending
column9: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2020
column14: I always watch youtube videos called “how i cleared my acne” and i will try what the people say in the videos. it never works for me, and that goes to show you how different everyone’s skin is. something that may work for you, may not work for someone else. so i’m not telling you it will work for you, but it works for me. i have tried EVERYTHING to get rid of my body acne, and some things worked a little, some things would work then stop working, some things would make it worse, and some would completely do nothing. Every day I mix this with the cerave fragrance free body wash and apply to my trouble areas, and I swear it’s working like magic. I’ve never been this happy with a product. It has only been a couple weeks though, hopefully it keeps working.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2020
column14: My daughter has keratosis pilaris (small white bumps, that are not quite pimples) on her upper arms that she has had since high school. She finds them very embarrassing even though they are not really super noticeable to anyone else. She has been using Misumi for a little over two weeks on her upper arms and has noticed a 50% reduction in her KP.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2021
column14: Ive tried to like and use this product. But it leaves a film instead of actually washing your face. Is it medicine ? How does one clean a face without a lather and the product just sits on top of the skin? To many questions. Never again

column9: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2020
column14: Unfortunately this stuff smells old to me. If you've ever smelled old lotion before this has that smell. I don't know if I got a old bottle or what,  but it had my body smelling terrible. Then, it claims to exfoliates but I don't understand how when it has no type of exfoliating pieces/particles in it. Ultimately, I'm very disappointed especially at it's price point.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2021
column14: I have been struggling with bacne for over 15 years and nothing I have tried has helped, until now! I was incredibly skeptical because I've been trying everything forever and nothing worked, but I figured...what's another product? Initially I was disappointed because it doesn't foam at all, so I didn't fell like I was getting a great clean. Turns out...I'd be pleasantly surprised. My back is the clearest it has been in 15 years! I'm so in love with this product, I've been using it for two months and continue to see improvement. I did have a breakout initially but kept with it and assumed it was purging and I'm so glad I didn't give up. I highly recommend this to anyone who has been struggling with body acne, give it time to work and you won't be disappointed. I only with it came in larger sizes, 4 oz runs out quickly when it's meant for overall body use.

column6: Doesn't work. Size too small for price
column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2020
column14: This has done nothing to clear the acne on my back. Literally no results what so ever. Actually, I'm having new acne spots appear while using this product. Not to mention the price in comparison to the size of the bottle. The bottle is small, more a face product size. $27 for a very small tube that's supposed to cover your back. How does that make sense. A waste of money in my opinion..

column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2022
column14: Too much money for the size.  Absolutely no lather so you can’t tell if it’s getting to all areas of your back or not.  It feels more like a lotion than a body wash.  Saw no improvement in my acne.  Wouldn’t recommend this to anyone.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2020
column14: My daughter has struggled with back acne and after trying several different products, this seems to be working
